ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re:Summoning Mobs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would beg to differ, just because of one of my most spectactular deaths--at Vox s lair, during my first Vox raid.  We had a buggy IG that warped most of
ygData.messageBody:
> I think the summoning rule is different in Velious than Kunark and
> Old World

I would beg to differ, just because of one of my most spectactular
deaths--at Vox's lair, during my first Vox raid. We had a buggy IG that
warped most of the way back to her lair, and then started summoning. I
had not done melee damage or non-melee damage, or anything...all I was
singing the entire time since he had been pulled was mana song (I wish
busy trying to convince a cleric not too leave, so I was too distracted
to twist). The first person to be summoned was the bard that had tried
to mez him (don't ask me), and then me...

Actually, the resultant death was pretty comical, though...the other bard
had dragged him back out to one of the pits before he managed to kill
her, so when he summoned me, he hit me once, and I fell into the
pit...where I took falling damage, was swiped once by a polar bear, and
then the IG decided I was too far away and summoned me again and hit me
once, and you get the picture :) I /q'd out, but it didn't save me.
That goes in my book as my all-time favorite death (well, only because I
got my res ;P)

-Karisma
